author: emlautarom1
content:
Hello, I'm currently working at Nethermind and recently we got a report for an issue on the `eth_estimateGas` method, specifically related to the resulting error that this method can produce. This is not the first time that we get such report, and we've been discussing with the team how to best tackle this kind of issues.
We've created a ticket on the official JSON-RPC spec (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/issues/463) to discuss this topic with the rest of the core devs and we would appreciate any input/suggestion.

author: sky.cactus
content: Subscribed.  I recommend coming up with a suggestion for how you *think* it should be done.  Standardization always goes better when you start with a concrete and complete proposal and solicit feedback on it rather than asking a large group of people "how should be do this?".
